data.name: Last Contingency
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to a pre-release of Last Contingency! A post-apocalyptic based Survival game gearing towards Survival, I like the idea of a unique survival game that will hopefully build into something that will change the 'Survival' Genre & flourish into may new & creative ideas!

Last Contingency has amazing & great features you can explore throughout the game & continues to be worked on.
- creative building whether it be a shelter, box or a beautiful ranchers home!
- crafting tools, weapons, clothing etc.
- Zombies & animals
- inventory management

Help us grow & let us know what we can do as we like to listen to our community & take their ideas into consideration as well! This game as mentioned is being pre-released so there's so much more to come!
- new types of animals to harvest and use their materials for multitudes of things
- more entities & items to enhance crafting experiences & building
- gun crafting, which uses gun components & materials to craft weapons making it a little more difficult to get to that end game experience.
- team system
- and much, much more!
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to a pre-release of Last Contingency! A post-apocalyptic based Survival game gearing towards Survival, I like the idea of a unique survival game that will hopefully build into something that will change the 'Survival' Genre & flourish into may new & creative ideas!

Last Contingency has amazing & great features you can explore throughout the game & continues to be worked on.
- creative building whether it be a shelter, box or a beautiful ranchers home!
- crafting tools, weapons, clothing etc.

Help us grow & let us know what we can do as we like to listen to our community & take their ideas into consideration as well! This game as mentioned is being pre-released so there's so much more to come!

data.short_description: Last Contingency is a post-apocalyptic survival game pushing survival to it's brink! start on the outer banks of a deserted island in hopes to move inland & find better loot! join a team or be a lone wolf either way keep a sharp eye or you might find yourself alone on the outer banks once again!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core processor (Ryzen 3 3100 OR core i5 7400)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD [R9 290] OR Nvidia [gtx 970]
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: running the game with playable frame rates!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: hex-core processor AMD[Ryzen 5 3600] Intel [Core i5-9600K]
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia gtx 1660 6gb OR AMD rx580 8gb
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: running the game much more smoothly with higher fps!
